content: keep warm while looking great with this knit beanie stitched in caron colorama halo o go this cozy knit hat is double layered and worked in the round from crown to crown using easy increases and decreases for shaping the clever color change halfway through allows you to create both a light and dark ombre hat all in one worn slouchy or with a folded brim it s a stylish choice to complement all your winter wear materials caron® colorama halo™ perfect phasing™ 8 oz/227 g 481 yds/440 m bluestone frost 76004 1 ball or 236 yds/216 m size one size to fit adult s head
